questions.name: template_1
questions.sql: SELECT Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2018')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = 'Breeze'))
NLquestions: How many days with__ Wind were there in__ ==,== in_2018 ?

questions.name: template_2
questions.sql: SELECT Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2022')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = '11-20') OR (Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = '0-10') OR (Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = 'Calm') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = 'Storm'))

questions.name: template_3

questions.name: template_4

NLquestions: What is/are_the_ /numbers_of_days with__ Wind in__ ==,== in_2022 or 2018 ?

questions.name: template_6
questions.sql: SELECT Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2022') OR (Year = '2018')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = '21-30') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = 'Breeze') OR (Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = 'Calm'))

questions.name: template_7
questions.sql: SELECT sum(Value) AS sum_Value, avg(Value) AS avg_Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2022')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = '11-20') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = '21-30') OR (Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = '0-10'))
NLquestions: What is/are_the_ /numbers_of_days with__ Temperature or Wind in__ ==,== in_2022 ?

questions.name: template_8
questions.sql: SELECT Year, min(Value) AS min_Value, max(Value) AS max_Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2022') OR (Year = '2018')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = '11-20') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = '21-30') OR (Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = '0-10')) GROUP BY Year

NLquestions: What is/are_the_ /numbers_of_days with__ Temperature or Wind in__ ==,== in_2018 ?

questions.name: template_11

questions.name: template_15
questions.sql: SELECT Characteristic, Intensity, Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2018')) AND (Characteristic, Intensity) IN (SELECT Characteristic, Intensity FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2022')) AND Value < 15.47)
